actions.text: Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States relating to the definition of raw value for purposes of raw sugar import tariff rate quota.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the method of calculating "raw value" for purposes of determining the tariff rate quota on certain imported raw cane sugar.

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States relating to the definition of raw value for purposes of raw sugar import tariff rate quota.
